        1. …in reply to @rknightuk
          If we "agree" that it's okay to have to pay to vote what about if it was £100 for ID? What if we make is £10k instead so only the richest can vote? Forcing voter ID for a problem that barely exists (if at all) does nothing but stop the poorest people in the country from voting.

    1. …in reply to @rknightuk
      Depending on the circles you run in, you might be thinking "who doesn't have ID?". I worked for ~8 months in a second-hand game shop and we required ID for trade ins. We had to start accepting a bank card as ID because so many people just didn't have any kind of photo ID.
      Permalink On twitter.com ↗ 2021 May 11 Mood +3 🙂
